meta.title: Nav
meta.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

props.description: Align the nav items in the nav: 'start' (or 'left'), 'center', 'end' (or 'right')
Set this prop when the nav is placed inside a card header
Proportionately fills all horizontal space with nav items. All horizontal space is occupied, but not every nav item has the same width
Fills all horizontal space with nav items, but unlike 'fill', every nav item will be the same width
Renders the nav items with the appearance of pill buttons
Renders the nav items with the appearance of tabs

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the nav

props.description: Additional attributes to place on the nested link element
CSS class (or classes) to place on the nested link element

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the nav item
